briefTitle: Kansas University DHA Outcome Study (KUDOS) Follow-Up
officialTitle: Kansas University DHA Outcome Study (KUDOS) Follow-Up
summary: This is a continuation study to KUDOS (NCT00266825). The purpose of this study is to follow-up with participants on the original study to determine if the effects of increasing DHA intake during pregnancy increase cognitive development in 2 to 6 year-old children.

primaryOutcome.measure: Weschler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence, 3rd Edition; Full Scale IQ
